### Research Opportunities in Bioinformatics, Computational biology, Data science, and AI

Join our cutting-edge research lab that uses bioinformatics, computational biology, and machine learning to investigate long-standing questions in medicine, agriculture, and life sciences with the goal of benefiting humankind. Our team of experienced scientists offers opportunities for Ph.D. students, masters thesis students, bachelors thesis students, interns, and paid research trainees.

### Opportunities include

1. Conducting cutting-edge research using AI and bioinformatics techniques
2. Professional growth and career development in a dynamic and supportive research environment
3. Opportunity to work abroad under the supervision of an experienced researcher
4. Hands-on experience in laboratory techniques and research methods
5. Publish findings in peer-reviewed journals and present at conferences
